articles.title: Video: This is why the January 6 committee wants Cipollone to testify - CNN Video
articles.description: Nixon's White House Counsel John Dean was a crucial witness during the Watergate hearings. Now the the House select committee investigating January 6 expects the same kind of cooperation from Trump's White House counsel Pat Cipollone. CNN's Brian Todd explain…

articles.title: Video: Former GOP lawmaker reacts to Sean Hannity bashing latest Jan. 6 hearing - CNN Video
articles.description: Former GOP congressman Joe Walsh reacts to Fox host Sean Hannity's criticism of the recent January 6th hearing.

articles.author: Zachary Cohen, Ryan Nobles, Annie Grayer
articles.title: January 6 committee subpoenas Trump White House counsel Pat Cipollone for testimony
articles.description: The House select committee investigating the January 6, 2021, US Capitol attack has issued a subpoena to compel testimony from Pat Cipollone, former President Donald Trump's White House counsel.
articles.content:
The House select committee investigating the January 6, 2021, US Capitol attack has issued a subpoena to compel testimony from Pat Cipollone, former President Donald Trumps White House counsel.
This… [+38 chars]

articles.title: Former Trump campaign CFO testifies to January 6 committee
articles.description: Sean Dollman, who worked for former President Donald Trump's 2020 campaign as chief financial officer, testified on Wednesday before the House select committee investigating the January 6, 2021, insurrection, CNN has learned.

articles.author: Casey Tolan, CNN
articles.title: Some district attorneys in red states have vowed not to prosecute abortion cases
articles.description: As abortion bans go into effect in states across the US, how strongly the laws are enforced will depend on local prosecutors -- and some are promising not to bring abortion providers to court.

articles.author: Nicole Hemmer
articles.title: Opinion: This is so much worse than Watergate
articles.description: By exposing the limitations analogizing January 6 to Watergate, Cassidy Hutchinson's explosive testimony should change how the American public understands presidential scandal, argues Nicole Hemmer. US democracy now depends on it, she writes.

articles.author: Analysis by Chris Cillizza, CNN Editor-at-large
articles.title: Analysis: An overlooked 'wow' moment from the 1/6 committee's latest hearing
articles.description: Michael Flynn wasn't the star of the House January 6 committee's hearing on Tuesday. In fact, he appeared -- via taped video testimony -- for less than five minutes.
